snippet.title: Rogue Summoner - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
BUY NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355510/Rogue_Summoner/

Rogue Summoner is a turned-based tactical roguelike about conjuring fantasy creatures to fight for you.
In Rogue Summoner, you explore procedural dungeons, fighting monsters in a table-top strategic combat system with an atmospheric medieval soundtrack. The gameplay is about predicting the battle based on the monsters’ behaviors, summoning creatures creatively, casting spells and having a lot of fun winning your battles. 

The game was crafted by Daniel and Tiago Zaidan with a lot of care. We hope you really love it.
https://gamecraftstudios.com
